name: Katana Soul
description: Play as the samurai Kan and fight in a dark, demon-infested Japan. Face this 100% arcade experience without any credits or saves: you can only rely on your skills with the katana.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB di RAM Storage: 128 MB available space
